title: The Lex Fridman Podcast
description: The Lex Fridman Podcast covers a wide range of topics, including AI, science, technology, history, philosophy, and the nature of intelligence, consciousness, love, and power. The show takes the form of long-form interviews, typically running two to four hours in length, and conducted in-person. Some of the notable guests who have been featured on the podcast include musician Kanye West, chess grandmaster Magnus Carlsen, and businessmen Ray Dalio, Jack Dorsey, Elon Musk, and Mark Zuckerberg.
